ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates easy Xaml Styling via the ThemeManager. SciChart includes six pre-defined Themes, which provide chart pane, grid-line brushes and default colors for Renderable Series
ExampleDefinition.Description:
SciChart Ships with 8 stunning themes, which you can apply to your charts with a single line of code. This example showcases the themes, and how they affect default cursor, zoom, axis, grid and series colors.
In addition, you can create [url='http://support.scichart.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/Article/View/17246/38/how-to-create-a-custom-theme-for-scichart']Custom Themes[/url]
